description: Try our easy to follow Triple Chocolate Cream Puffs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Triple Chocolate Cream Puffs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer white choc mousse to a piping bag fitted with a small plain nozzle. Split profiteroles and fill with mousse. Dip tops of profiteroles into chocolate ganache and chill to set.
